abilities.name: Authority of the Inquisition
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, it can embark within any **TRANSPORT** that its Bodyguard unit can embark within.

abilities.name: No Mercy
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is Below Half‐strength, add 1 to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Psyoculum
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the **[ANTI-PSYKER 4+]** ability.
